MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G69 postcode area of Baillieston, affecting properties in Garrowhill Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:24am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations to locate and repair a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:53am on the 14th of April 2021
